document_data.mainbody:
orok Thundercracker was a dwarfish hero who lived long before the 14 century DR.
Boroks fame came after he led several successful military campaigns against giants and other "tall vermin" that menaced dwarven communities at the time. His enchanted war hammer faced many opponents, gaining its name â€“ Boroks Fist, the weapon that was called his "little iron fist" by Boroks elven allies behind his back. Many thought the weapon to be blessed. Subsequently, Borok Thundercrackers war hammer left the dwarfs possessions, eventually ending up in the city of Athkatla in Amn.
